I get by the art why this'd make front page but this artist's writing has always been rather lazy at best. To be fair this is a pretty old work from him that only got TL'd now but he hasn't really made anything with good plot since then. A bit of a waste to scan to me but guess it's just personal preference. I was honestly hoping his Tsuiran piece would get TL'd before this since the sex scenes are subjectively better. The rest seem just as copy and paste as this except maybe with a dad instead of a gyaru-oh.

okay people seem to be confused so let me explain:
NTR: Story that involves a woman (or man) being stolen away from a main character, it's supposed to make you feel jelousy and despair as it follows the guy getting cucked around, it also involves having the guy/girl doing the cuck as someone who usually sees the loved one of the MC as a slab of meat, no respect, no love just dominace and power play, it usally has a depressive ending
Netori: Story that actually focuses on the person doing the cuck or the woman/man being stolen, it tends to show the person as someone who actually loves the man/woman and was to win her, it also tends to the person getting cucked as distant, taking his/her loved one for granted or even abusive, it's usually ends on a possitive note or even a happy ending.
This is clearly Netori.
